Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.name: flaneurImagePickerController(_:didFinishPickingImages:userInfo:)
Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user is done picking images.

Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.name: flaneurImagePickerController(_:withCurrentSelectionOfSize:actionForNewImageSelection:)
Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.abstract: Asks the delegate what to do with the new image the user just tapped.

Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.name: flaneurImagePickerControllerDidCancel(_:)
Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user cancelled the pick operation.

Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.name: flaneurImagePickerControllerDidFail(_:)
Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.abstract: Tells the delegate that the image picker controller met an error.

Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.name: FlaneurImagePickerControllerDelegate
Protocols/FlaneurImagePickerControllerDe.abstract: A set of methods that your delegate object must implement to interact with the image picker interface.

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.name: add
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.abstract: Adds the new image to the current selection (default).

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.name: replaceLast
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.abstract: Replace the last item of the current selection with the new image.

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.name: doNothing
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.abstract: Do nothing: leave the current selection unchanged and ignore the new image.

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html#/s:.name: selectedImages
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html#/s:.abstract: Section where selected images go, top section by default

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html#/s:.name: imageSources
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html#/s:.abstract: Section allowing the user to select an image source, middle section by default

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html#/s:.name: pickerView
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html#/s:.abstract: Section showing the pictures of the currently selected image source, bottom section by default

Enums/FlaneurImageSource.html#/s:18Flane.name: camera
Enums/FlaneurImageSource.html#/s:18Flane.abstract: User’s camera source, needs Privacy - Camera Usage Description set in info.plist

Enums/FlaneurImageSource.html#/s:18Flane.name: library
Enums/FlaneurImageSource.html#/s:18Flane.abstract: User’s library source, needs Privacy - Photo Library Usage Description set in info.plist

Enums/FlaneurImageSource.html#/s:18Flane.name: instagram
Enums/FlaneurImageSource.html#/s:18Flane.abstract: User’s intagram source, needs InstagramClientID and InstagramRedirectURI set in info.plist

Enums/FlaneurImageDescriptionSourceType..name: url
Enums/FlaneurImageDescriptionSourceType..abstract: It means that the image is set via the imageURL property and is of URL type

Enums/FlaneurImageDescriptionSourceType..name: image
Enums/FlaneurImageDescriptionSourceType..abstract: It means that the image is set via the image property and is of UIImage type

Enums/FlaneurImageDescriptionSourceType..name: phAsset
Enums/FlaneurImageDescriptionSourceType..abstract: It means that the image is set via the associatedPHAsset property and is of PHAsset type

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html.name: FlaneurImagePickerSection
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerSection.html.abstract: Used to reference a section into the Image Picker

Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.name: FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction
Enums/FlaneurImagePickerControllerAction.abstract: Specifies what action to perform when a new image is tapped.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.name: delegate
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the picker view.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.abstract: Contains all the Image Picker’s configurations, you can override those configs by setting their public properties

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.abstract: A DataSource method used to feed the collection with data for a

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.abstract: A DataSource method used to associate a section controller

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.name: emptyView(for:)
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerController.htm.abstract: A DataSource method used to show an empty view in the collection

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesArray
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Changes the order of the imageSources shown in the .imageSources section

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: titleForImageSource
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Title displayed for the image source selection button.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageForImageSource
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Image displayed for the image source selection button.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesTitleColor
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Title color for the image source selection buttons.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesBackgroundColor
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Background color for the image source selection buttons.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: backgroundColorForSection
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Background color for a specific collectionView in a section.

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: pageControlTintColor
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Color of the not selected dots of the pageControl

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: pageControlCurrentIndexColor
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Color of the currently selected dot of the pageControl

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: sizeForImagesPickerView
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Size of each thumbnail image shown in the .pickerView section, defaults to 1:4 of the screen’s width

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: paddingForImagesPickerView
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Padding for each image shown in the .pickerView section, defaults to 0

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: imageSourcesCellWidth
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Size of each image source’s cell shown in the .imageSources section, defaults to the screen’s width divided by the total number

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: selectedImagesContentMode
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Content Mode for images in the .selectedImages section, defaults to .scaleAspectFill

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.name: sectionsOrderArray
Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Changes the order of the sections shown on the screen

Classes/FlaneurImagePickerConfig.html#/s.abstract: Class of the custom view to use for authorization view.

Classes/FlaneurImageDescription.html#/s:.abstract: Check if two objects of the same type are equal

Classes/FlaneurImageDescription.html.abstract: FlaneurImageDescription is a model used to store an image.
